message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUCTION_FV_METHOD_INVALID
message.locale: Only Cash and Cheque methods of receipt are supported for online receipt of payments.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_LEDGERNO_AND_CHEQUENO_SET
message.locale: Both Cheque Number and Ledger Number were specified. Details for 2 different types of Instrument (Cheque and Cash) cannot apply to a single payment received.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_NUMBER_COMBO_INVALID
message.locale: An invalid combination exists for the payment received instrument details specified. Please check that a cheque instrument has a Cheque number or a cash instrument has a ledger number.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_CHECK_CHECKNUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: A Cheque number must be supplied for cheque payments.
